mapper.select: SELECT hw_product_id, hw_product_name, hw_product_status, recruitment_start_date, service_start_date, service_end_date, total_budget_fil, city, details, picture_url FROM filmountain_test.hw_product ORDER BY recruitment_start_date DESC;

SELECT product.hw_product_id, product.hw_product_name, product.hw_product_status, product.recruitment_start_date, product.service_start_date, product.service_end_date, product.total_budget_fil, product.city, product.details, product.picture_url, product.miner_id FROM filmountain_test.hw_product product INNER JOIN hw_investment investment ON investment.hw_product_id = product.hw_product_id where investment.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY product.hw_product_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hw_product ( hw_product_name, hw_product_status, total_budget_fil, city, details, picture_url, recruitment_start_date, service_start_date, service_end_date ) VALUES ( #{hw_product_name}, #{hw_product_status}, #{total_budget_fil}, #{city}, #{details}, #{picture_url}, NOW(), #{service_start_date}, #{service_end_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT product.hw_product_id, product.hw_product_name, product.hw_product_status, product.recruitment_start_date, product.service_start_date, product.service_end_date, product.total_budget_fil, product.city, product.details, product.picture_url, product.miner_id FROM filmountain_test.hw_product product where product.hw_product_id = #{hw_product_id}
